titlealts.searchtitle: Data Set: National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care - Specification

entry.p: To carry the Baby's demographic details where anonymisation of the record is NOT required.One occurrence of this group is required.
To carry the Baby's demographic details where anonymisation of the record IS required.One occurrence of this group is required.
To carry the Parent's demographic details where anonymisation of the record is NOT required.One occurrence of this group is permitted.
To carry the Parent's demographic details where anonymisation of the record IS required.One occurrence of this group is permitted.
To carry details of the pregnancy.One occurrence of this group is required
To carry details of the labour and delivery.One occurrence of this group is required
To carry details of the admission to Neonatal Critical Care.One occurrence of this group is required.
DISCHARGE FROM NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE UNIT
To carry details of the discharge from the Neonatal Intensive Care Unit.One occurrence of this group is permitted.
To carry details of procedures recorded at discharge.Multiple occurrences of this group are permitted.
To carry details of Clinical Trial enrolment at any time during the Neonatal Critical Care Period.Multiple occurrences of this group are permitted.
To carry indicators relating to Infection Cultures undertaken at any time during the Neonatal Critical Care Period.One occurrence of this group is permitted.
To carry information relating to Infection Cultures at any time during the Neonatal Critical Care Period.Multiple occurrences of this group are permitted.
To carry an indicator relating to Abdominal X-Rays undertaken at any time during the Neonatal Critical Care Period.One occurrence of this group is permitted.
To carry information relating to Abdominal X-Rays at any time during the Neonatal Critical Care Period.Multiple occurrences of this group are permitted.
To carry an indicator relating to Retinopathy of Prematurity Screening undertaken at any time during the Neonatal Critical Care Period.One occurrence of this group is required.
To carry information relating to Retinopathy of Prematurity Screening at any time during the Neonatal Critical Care Period.Multiple occurrences of this group are permitted.
To carry an indicator relating to Cranial Ultrasound Scans undertaken at any time during the Neonatal Critical Care Period.One occurrence of this group is permitted.
To carry information relating to Cranial Ultrasound Scans at any time during the Neonatal Critical Care Period.Multiple occurrences of this group are permitted.
To carry an indicator relating to Newborn Blood Spot Tests undertaken at any time during the Neonatal Critical Care Period.One occurrence of this group is required.
To carry details of Newborn Blood Spot Biochemical Screening undertaken at any time in the Neonatal Critical Care Period.Multiple occurrences of this group are permitted.
To carry an indicator relating to Newborn Hearing Screening undertaken at any time during the Neonatal Critical Care Period.One occurrence of this group is permitted.
To carry information relating to Newborn Hearing Screening at any time during the Neonatal Critical Care Period.Multiple occurrences of this group are permitted.
To carry General Information relating to Daily Care.Multiple occurrences of this group are permitted (at least one occurrence is required).
To carry Respiratory information relating to Daily Care.One occurrence of this group is required.
To carry Cardiovascular information relating to Daily Care.One occurrence of this group is required.
To carry Gastrointestinal information relating to Daily Care.One occurrence of this group is required.
To carry Blood Transfusion information relating to Daily Care.Multiple occurrences of this group are permitted.
To carry Neurology information relating to Daily Care.One occurrence of this group is required.
Daily Care Retinopathy of Prematurity Screening
To carry Retinopathy of Prematurity information relating to Daily Care.One occurrence of this group is required.
To carry Fluids and Feeding information relating to Daily Care.One occurrence of this group is required.
To carry Infection information relating to Daily Care.One occurrence of this group is required.
To carry Jaundice information relating to Daily Care.One occurrence of this group is required.
To carry Medication Administered information relating to Daily Care.One occurrence of this group is permitted.
